title: Dashboard
description: This schema defines the Dashboard entity. Dashboards are computed from data and visually present data, metrics, and KPIs. They are typically updated in real-time and allow interactive data exploration.

dashboardType.description: This schema defines the type used for describing different types of dashboards.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies a dashboard instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Dashboard. It could be title or label from the source services.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies a dashboard in the format 'ServiceName.DashboardName'.

description.description: Description of the dashboard, what it is, and how to use it.

project.description: Name of the project / workspace / collection in which the dashboard is contained

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

sourceUrl.description: Dashboard URL suffix from its service.

charts.description: All the charts included in this Dashboard.

dataModels.description: List of data models used by this dashboard or the charts contained on it.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

service.description: Link to service where this dashboard is hosted in.

serviceType.description: Service type where this dashboard is hosted in.

usageSummary.description: Latest usage information for this dashboard.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.

domains.description: Domains the Dashboard belongs to. When not set, the Dashboard inherits the domain from the dashboard service it belongs to.

dataProducts.description: List of data products this entity is part of.

lifeCycle.description: Life Cycle properties of the entity
